categories: Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Devo was a Jedi Master who served the Jedi Order at the Valo Temple on the planet Valo during the High Republic Era. As Lonisa City prepared to host the Republic Fair, Devo, along with Master Shonnatrucks, were greeting the security forces that the Galactic Republic sent for the event. The two Masters were accompanied by the Padawans of the Valo Temple, aside from Ram Jomaram.
